episodes.title: Shiny Happy People: A Teenage Holy War, Season 2 - Official Trailer | Prime Video
episodes.description:
Season 2 coming to Prime Video July 23, 2025.

Teen Mania captivated a generation of fervent evangelical Millennial kids with adrenaline-fueled, ecstatic religious experiences through “Acquire the Fire” rallies. But beneath the glittering surface lurked sadistic boot camps, staged martyrdom drills, and fascism disguised as faith - transforming innocent teens into fanatical soldiers, with devastating consequences still unfolding today.

» SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/PrimeVideoSubscribe
